title: Font ID please
content:
Can anybody identify this font please, I’ve tried Identifont and Whatsmyfont but still can’t find it.

Many thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Browns Font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708211437/http:/typophile.com/files/Browns%20Font.jpg) | 34.38 KB |

author: Tomsk

comments.content:
Bank Gothic

but they fixed up the s.
Brilliant thanks, like you say they’ve trimmed part of the S but for the rest of the text it’s going to be fine.
